Pre-Game Insights: The Royals aim to sweep the series with a win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pirates have a 49-17 record in games when they have more hits than their opponents.
The Royals have gone 52-19 in games when they scored five or more runs.
The teams meet Sunday for the third time this season.
Andrew McCutchen has 17 doubles, a triple and 20 home runs for the Pirates.
Jared Triolo is 11-for-32 with a double and two home runs over the last 10 games.
Bobby Witt Jr. leads the Royals with 85 extra base hits (43 doubles, 11 triples and 31 home runs).
Tommy Pham is 12-for-42 with two doubles, two home runs and seven RBI over the past 10 games.
Others: The line for the game is Pirates -112, Royals -107; over/under is 8 runs.
